text: I nerd sniped myself a little on this one. I'm over 11,000 words in and realizing its gotten away from me a little, but I suppose it wants to come out. I'm organizing into parts and moving some things into an appendix so the main text is easier to follow. I'll probably post it in chunks.

elements.text: I nerd sniped myself a little on this one. I'm over 11,000 words in and realizing its gotten away from me a little, but I suppose it wants to come out. I'm organizing into parts and moving some things into an appendix so the main text is easier to follow. I'll probably post it in chunks.

text:
I've just been working on this stuff a really long time, starting from 2007. There's a lot of ground to cover to describe all the relevant aspects of a distributed reactive system, especially when a lot of it was custom and working from different reference points than OP and most readers would be familiar with (since it has a totally different genealogy). I've never really done a public facing writeup of it before - we never did company whitepapers or anything. So, its been interesting just the act of writing about it, especially all this time later.

I still wanted to share a more appropriate briefer writeup  response more like I intended - I mostly just need to organize and edit from this larger document into that. And then I can share the larger work later if anyone is interested.

elements.text:
I've just been working on this stuff a really long time, starting from 2007. There's a lot of ground to cover to describe all the relevant aspects of a distributed reactive system, especially when a lot of it was custom and working from different reference points than OP and most readers would be familiar with (since it has a totally different genealogy). I've never really done a public facing writeup of it before - we never did company whitepapers or anything. So, its been interesting just the act of writing about it, especially all this time later.

I still wanted to share a more appropriate briefer writeup  response more like I intended - I mostly just need to organize and edit from this larger document into that. And then I can share the larger work later if anyone is interested.
